title: RESOLVED: Use GOOD/BAD/OK/WARNING/WAIT classification
description:
Decision made to use simplified classification schema instead of production grades.

## Classification Schema
| Classification | Meaning | Action |
|----------------|---------|--------|
| **GOOD** | High performers | Scale budget 30-100% |
| **OK** | Average performers | Monitor |
| **WARNING** | Underperformers | Review creative/targeting |
| **BAD** | Wasteful spend | Pause or reduce 50-100% |
| **WAIT** | Learning phase | Need more data |

## Mapping from Production Grades
| Production | Agatha |
|------------|--------|
| grade=A + winners | GOOD |
| grade=A/B + high_potential | OK |
| grade=C + underperformers | WARNING |
| grade=D + losers | BAD |
| days_active < 7 | WAIT |

## Resolution
Implementation plan updated with new classification schema, config-driven thresholds, and mapping from production grades. See docs/implementation-plan.md lines 710-850.
